overview: A luxurious palace, an ancient curse that comes from the distant past ... A wealthy baron Instructs agency business to take care of the sale of his luxurious mansion, a beautiful nineteenth-century castle. Sensed the bargain two shoppers go on site together with the mediator and the absence of the owner, decided to visit the castle before purchase ... but the old building conceals a mystery, an ancient curse: the atrocious death a Countess ... revenge resurfaces within the walls of the palace and involves all the players ...
title: Mistery
